name: Heracleum
description:
Made as a contribution to the project Open — the Russian Federation Pavilion at the 17th Venice Architecture Biennale 2021 — within the week-long ArchiJam game jam organized together with the MARCH School of Architecture and the Scream School.
In ‘Chimera tectonica’ game’s research/concept we take Heracléum Sosnówskyi (selectively bred plant) as a metaphor for anthropocentric influence on the world.
Answering how will we live together we suggest ‘staying with the trouble'
Partner institutions: MARCH and Scream School
